segments.text: You don ’ t have to eat them . I don ’ t mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks mom ! Can I have dessert now ? I love chocolate cake !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No dessert for you unless you eat all your vegetables .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don ’ t like them ! It ’ s not fair !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can have some fruit for dessert . If you eat an apple and a banana , I might let you have a small piece of chocolate cake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok ... actually , I don ’ t mind eating peas and carrots , buy I hate broccoli and cauliflower .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll remember that for next time . You ’ ll get extra peas and carrots , buy no broccoli or cauliflower . OK ?
segments.speaker: S2
